name: human-readable-numbers
description: Print numbers in human readable format.

scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist && uglifyjs ./src/index.js > ./dist/index.min.js -b beautify=false,preamble="'/*! Human readable numbers - v0.9 - 2018; Licensed MIT */'"
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "Upgrade to %s [ci skip]" && npm publish

author: Antony Belov <cerberus.ab@mail.ru>
